indian.details: 96-hour Visa Free Transit (VFTF) possible ONLY if you have a valid visa for US, UK, Aus, Can, Ger, Jap, or NZ.

activities.title: Jewel Rain Vortex + Canopy Park (Jewel)
activities.description: The iconic indoor waterfall + glass dome vibes. Best for photos, quick sightseeing, and a ‘Singapore moment’ without going deep into the city. This is LANDSIDE at Jewel (immigration required). Keywords: waterfall, photos, landmark, chill walk, airport attraction.
activities.founders_tip: If you have 6–10h and want max sights with low risk, Jewel is the safest ‘big payoff’ play.

activities.title: Changi Airport Skytrain + Terminal Exploration
activities.description: Zero-friction option if you have no visa or it’s late. Explore terminals, ride the Skytrain, chill zones, shops, and hidden corners. Keywords: airside, late night, easy, no immigration, relax.

activities.title: Butterfly Garden (T3 Transit)
activities.description: A calm airside garden with butterflies + greenery. Good for relaxing, photos, and killing 45–90 mins without leaving transit. Keywords: chill, nature, airside, easy.

activities.title: Free Singapore Tour (Transit City Tour)
activities.description: Official transit passenger tour. Requires registration and immigration clearance (you leave the airport area). This is city sightseeing ‘lite’ and is time-sensitive. Keywords: city tour, sightseeing, highlights, bus tour, transit tour.
activities.founders_tip: Only recommend if the user has visa/entry access and arrives early enough for tour times.

activities.title: Marina Bay Sands SkyPark (Viewpoint)
activities.description: High-impact skyline viewpoint. Best for photos, iconic Singapore skyline, quick ‘wow’ sightseeing. Requires MRT/taxi into the city. Keywords: skyline, viewpoint, photos, landmark.

activities.title: Gardens by the Bay (Supertrees + Domes)
activities.description: The best nature/sights combo in Singapore. Supertrees, Cloud Forest, aesthetic indoor domes. Requires city travel + time. Keywords: nature, sights, photos, iconic, domes.

activities.title: Merlion Park + Marina Bay Walk
activities.description: Low-effort sightseeing: Merlion photo, bay walk, skyline shots. Great when you want ‘max sights’ but don’t want a museum. Keywords: landmark, photos, quick walk, skyline.

activities.title: Chinatown + Buddha Tooth Relic Temple
activities.description: Culture + food + street vibes. Temple visit plus hawker-style eats nearby. Keywords: culture, temple, street food, exploring, shopping souvenirs.
activities.founders_tip: If the vibe mentions culture + food, this should rank high.

activities.title: Lau Pa Sat Hawker Centre (Satay Street vibes)
activities.description: Classic Singapore food mission: satay, laksa, hawker atmosphere. Works best evening/night, and it’s a strong FOOD pick. Keywords: hawker, street food, satay, local food, dinner.

activities.title: Airport Food Crawl (Changi Airside)
activities.description: If it’s late or you have no visa, stay airside and do a proper food crawl: noodles, coffee, desserts. Keywords: food, late night, airside, quick, easy.

activities.title: Ambassador Transit Hotel (Airside)
activities.description: SLEEP ONLY. Use this when the user explicitly wants sleep/rest/nap/shower or it’s an overnight layover where sightseeing isn’t realistic. Keywords: sleep, nap, rest, bed, shower, overnight.
activities.founders_tip: Should not rank high for ‘max sights’ queries.
